website_summaries.verdict: The joint health-maintaining ingredients included in this formula make it an excellent choice for the long-term health of giant breeds.
pros: Includes vitamins C and E as well as glucosamine and chondroitin for cartilage and joint health
Also contains omega fatty acids for skin and coat
cons: Not for dogs dealing with gluten, grain, or poultry allergies

website_summaries.verdict: Uses protein as the main ingredient, but it also delivers all-around nutritional value.
pros: Made in the United States, so you can trust the ingredients
Contains no artificial flavors or colors
Includes glucosamine and chondroitin, which helps large breeds with joint health
Food is easy to digest, which is nice for older large breed dogs
cons: A little pricier than some others

customer_reviews.title: Recent Science Diet Bag maybe contaminated or have unhealthy changes!
customer_reviews.text: Our yellow lab has eaten Science Diet since we got him at 8 weeks old. He is now 2 & 1/2 years old. We never had an issue w/ this dog food until this latest order. He was throwing up for 3 days and lethargic. We had to taken him to the vet; they did blood work and scans and ruled out major concerns. Our dog will not eat this food any more (is eating other food so we know he has his appetite back), and after looking at consumer affairs webpage it seems like we are not the only ones this has happened to.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Henry is not a fan of the new recipe..
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding our dog, Henry, this brand/recipe of dog food since we adopted him a year and a half ago. The last bag we received had new packaging and a new kibble shape. After doing a little research, it turns out Science Diet has changed the recipe. Henry has been eating this new recipe for 3 weeks now and we've noticed him eating grass every time we walk him.. which is twice a day ..and his poops are different ..a lot more fragrant. Henry's system is obviously not a fan so we'll have to change foods. We had a good run Science Diet!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Good food, good value
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good and wholesome dog food that is a nice balance between the cheap stuff with bad ingredients and the overpriced, fancy dog foods (which are usually unnecessary for what you pay). My vet recommended it. I can feel good knowing I am providing my dog a good diet without breaking the bank. I also love the new packaging method! I used to have concerns about the way they shipped the food but they have since improved on that and now it comes in a nice solid, well packaged box. The price has since gone up a bit but it's still a pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: dog food
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding Hill's Science Diet to all my pets for over 30 years. As a retired Vet Tech I wouldn't switch because I KNOW the research they put into their foods. And yes, I have heard all the hype about grain free, yada, yada. Carnivores in the wild do eat plant matter in the food they catch and kill. And I saw many dogs in my work that just could not tolerate the protein rich diets. Too much of a good thing is as bad as not enough.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kooken

customer_reviews.title: Helped With my Dogs Anal Gland Issues
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs was having problems with his anal glands getting backed up to the point where he needed them expressed every 3-4 weeks. Our vet recommended this food to us to see if it would help. The vet said dogs do not need grain free food, so I made sure to get one that had grains in it. Since he's been on this food his anal gland problems have lessened significantly, he's only needed them expressed every 3 months or so now.
customer_reviews.author: M. WalkerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not bad up to u
customer_reviews.text: Are used this product for a long time for my diet and then I read the ingredients and did some research and learned that this isn’t the best food that I should get my dog the vets do you recommend it I’m not sure why but I switched brands but it was a good dog food and if you want to use it I have nothing bad to say about it I just switched because I thought it would be better
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It's dog food designed by dog doctors...
customer_reviews.text: Dogs eat it. Bag is emptying into their bellies from a large plastic food locker I use to keep the smartest dog from ripping open food bags and having her way with the contents. Note that I have three of these plastic lockers. One for cat food. One for dog food, and one for bird seed. All to confuse one dog. I know it sounds complicated, but this particular dog us too smart for her own good.
customer_reviews.author: Okame

customer_reviews.title: My Huskey Love This Hill's Dried Food and Changed His Life For Much Better Health
customer_reviews.text: I read that this brand is just average, I'm hear to tell you that my Husky was bleeding internally from another popular brand dried dog food. The vet put him on Hills Prescription can food for a few weeks in two days there was no blood in his nowcsolid stools what so ever. Not only this but his happy meter went way up and his happy meal dance is off the scale since I change to Hills and the same results with Hill's dried food. So action speaks volumes from this Husky!
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper

customer_reviews.title: New recipe as of March 2019 causing diarrhea in dogs - long time customer, I’m canceling
customer_reviews.text: Switched kibble recipe and shape in March 2019 without telling us. (We subscribe for monthly delivery) These new kibbles are making our dog sick with diarrhea. We stopped for a week and he got better. Started again and diarrhea again. You need to investigate this new recipe because you are making dogs sick. I have cancelled all subscriptions and sending these bags back. I see other reviewers complaining about this switch in recipe you made. Please listen to the customers, you are poisoning the dogs with something.
customer_reviews.author: tweet

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm? okay
customer_reviews.text: surprise, surprise, surprise! I thought I ordered a 17lb bag of hill's Science lg dog food with 12 cans of the Hills Science dog food. BUT I received the extra large bag of dog food & no can dog food. Again HMMM? It is okay we use it I will just need to order some can food too. We are out of food for our big girl so we had to open bag. just wondering how this happen since the picture of our order is showing the bag n can food.
customer_reviews.author: Benita

customer_reviews.title: Healthy choices for your forever fur babies
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 large female Rotts who love this food. It’s a pleasure to see them eat and enjoy themselves. Last Saturday we went to the vet for shots, he asked what were we feeding the girls their coats were so shiny and soft. They are gorgeous! Buy this food and see for yourself what a difference it makes!
customer_reviews.author: Dian White

customer_reviews.title: Can’t find it cheaper than subscribe & save
customer_reviews.text: The dog food itself is high quality and the only brand our current and former vets recommended, our current vet is my cousin and I trust her. We have purchased this all over the place here locally but it is considerably cheaper on Amazon subscribe and save, plus it comes to our door without even a second thought about it. Love that
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeyefanjustin

customer_reviews.title: Not a BAD food, but...
customer_reviews.text: You can get a better food for the money. I know vet offices always recommend this, but take a wild guess as to why. Unfortunately, this is the only food my giant house cow will eat. His breeder is a veterinarian assistant, so this is what she fed them (go figure). Currently, he overall healthy and has a shiny coat on this food. Still trying to get him to gain weight after he starved himself in protest of me switching him to a better quality food -__- I guess this food is just what he does best on.
customer_reviews.author: Aharp4

customer_reviews.title: High quality Dog Food designed for our large dog. Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This product kept it’s promise. We fostered a Great Dane that was underweight, flaky dull coat. Didn’t take long to see some weight gain and her coat was shiny and healthy. This product was recommended to me by a friend who close to becoming a Veterinarian. She highly recommended this to be the #1 dog food for our dog. Glad we took her recommendation. Thank you for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: No more heavy lifting
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has been raised on science diet. This was recommended by our vet who is also my husbands uncle. This is food something you can feel good about feeding your dog. I love ordering through Amazon so I don’t have to haul a huge bag from store to car and car to house. Delivered to my door is priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley s

customer_reviews.title: Helped grow dogs hair back out
customer_reviews.text: My dog has allergies like most labs tend to. So she has to chew her hair out leaving big old bald spots. Knowing it was her food and trying almost every brand out there.. even the expensive stuff like solid gold etc.. nothing helped my poor pup. Giving her this did help, and she actually liked it enough to eat it without trying to starve herself.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Balanced diet for large breeds.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a five star on flavor because my German Shepherd seems to love it. I just wish this brand wasn’t so expensive. My German Shepherd been on this food for three years now, he’s in perfect health and shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Hate HDS new recipe
customer_reviews.text: We have used this dog food for years and years. This last batch we received on Subscribe &Save was shaped differently and smelled differently. The worst part is the increase in flatulence with our two labs. We are going through matches like crazy. We buy dog food based on the fart factor. Now, since HSD has changed their recipe, I have to cancel our subscription and search for another brand. Let me know if you go back to your older formulation.
customer_reviews.author: Lolita Wike

customer_reviews.title: New formula makes dog vomit
customer_reviews.text: According to my Amazon purchase history we'd bought 24 bags of this brand of dog food. Not only are the bags horrible our Lab began vomiting after her meals. She'd never done this before the formula, and bag, changed. We switched to different brand sold on Amazon and our dog has been fine.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: The Only Brand for Us and Subscribe and Save is a Back Saver
customer_reviews.text: We have two collies who were constantly have issues with the foods we fed them. They were very high quality name brands, which I won't mention here. We switched to this brand and variety and (knock on wood) have not had any problems for years. Also, the subscribe and save price is great and I don't have to lug 35 lb bags from the store to home.
customer_reviews.author: SkillDog

customer_reviews.title: Made our pup sick after eating for a year
customer_reviews.text: Our pup has been on science diet since he was a baby and we’ve never had a problem - until the most recent bag we bought - like many other reviewers our pup started having diarrhea and vomiting. We have always been loyal science diet feeders but after this I don’t feel like we can continue to feed our babies this. What a waste of $45 and I would not recommend this food. Edit: this may be more of a problem with the Amazon supplier than the food itself - I am not sure and unwilling to test it out by buying it in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I put I love it, but that's not true since I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I put I love it, but that's not true since I don't eat it. However, Winnie, the dog seems to love it. We have fed her Science Diet for years and she's now 11 years old and is a large dog. Many large dogs don't live a long life time but she seems to be thriving on her Science Diet regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Birdsong

customer_reviews.title: Very good dog food, good value
customer_reviews.text: I've used Science Diet dry food for my GSD since she was 10 weeks old. It's really healthy dog food and I like the larger kibble as she has to chew it up which helps keep her teeth clean. And the kibble size prevents her from trying to wolf it down. Lately, my dog has been ignoring this food for whatever reason. Tried another premium, more expensive brand and she's pretty much off that, too. I have to add some "taste" to the food and then she'll eat it.
customer_reviews.author: GrayslakeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Subscribe and save is not multi dog friendly
customer_reviews.text: I need order 1 bag a week but subscribe and save only let’s your order monthly. I can not afford to pay for 4 bags all at once so I am haveing to pay $47 a week instead. They need to add multi household dog options for the subscribe and save..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been vomiting nonstop after a couple days of being on this food. After doing more research, I discovered that this product has been recalled. I am VERY concerned about the wellbeing of my pooch and now I am going to incur hundreds of dollars in expenses. Vet fees, wasted dog food, and a ruined 8x10 area rug. My dog better make it through this! I should be compensated. Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: We have switched to this food for our two dogs. I love that I can have it shipped to my home for the same price or less than getting it at the store. Our dogs have also done great on this food with a lot less waste.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Hills knows what they are doing
customer_reviews.text: I have a greyhound and have to be picky about my food choices for her. Having been a vet tech, I really value Hills for their amazing food value and ingredients. They are safe and have years of animal focused study and testing behind it. This isnt a human focused company making food for animals. This is an animal focused company making food for animals.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholscl

customer_reviews.title: TRASHED IT. Was a reorder but dog won't touch this order/bag/food!
customer_reviews.text: Enough said. ZERO STAR would be nice. The January order of the same bag was just fine. The last 2 years of orders have been fine. // Ended up buying the Other Near Identical H's Science Diet Adult 1-6 Chicken and Barley. Not sure of the difference because pic and a year marketing. // I'd like a refund but can't exchange since we trashed it all. // No need to even donate to shelter. Bad stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Help me out

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 dogs. Pomerians one one food. Boxer on prescription diet. Science diet was started at the dog shelter. I find she loves it so much she has because an aggressive eater. Have to crate her during feeding time
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hanson-Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Science Diet is the best!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this being delivered! I’m on chemo, but love our 2 German Shepherds! But seriously, lifting those bags is just not possible right now. Thank you so much! And BTW, Science Diet is the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog food
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this dog food. We have 3 Bernese Mountain Dogs and 1 Borzoi and their primary diet consists of this dog food which keeps them very healthy. They have recently changed the packaging to these very firm boxes which arrive in much better condition than the previous packaging.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Not a good dog food for my Great Dane
customer_reviews.text: At first, my dog seemed to like this product. After about 2 years, the company changed the formula and my dog HATED it. Diarrhea ensued and we changed to a better product. Of course, I'm now stuck with a $50 bag of dog food that is sealed in the box unopened. The window to return it has passed. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Clint R

customer_reviews.title: My dog is obsessed with this food
customer_reviews.text: My dog is in love with this food. She is not picky, but we can use this food as high value treats, she likes it that much. She seems to do really well on it. This is my second dog we have used Science Diet on- it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: hburke

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog very sick
customer_reviews.text: This food made my dog very sick after the first day of switching over to it. He had diarrhea and vomiting which is completely out of the norm for him. I honestly would not recommend this specific food.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the bigger pieces my dog has a harder time eating and isn't wanting but I liked that it has some better ingredients like glucosamine in it my dog needs I wish it was softer for her to eat or smaller than she might like it better
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: New Recipe, not listed- upset stomach in dog due to lack of update!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I’m having the same issue as the most recent review. Pictured here is a different bag, different type/size of kibble and apparently a new recipe than what I received! Yes, my dog eats the Chicken & Barley recipe but I now anticipate upset stomach and diarrhea due to the bag we received NOT being the one pictured and listed here. Had it been listed on here correctly I could have mixed and slowly introduced my dog to this new recipe as it is necessary to do so for dogs. I am disappointed in the lack of updated information on this listing.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Pieces
customer_reviews.text: I’m confused because I always buy the same large breed formula for one of my dogs. However, this bag, the bites are small, as small as the puppy formula. My dog needs bigger pieces, otherwise she will swallow them whole and choke. I guess I won’t be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Your delivery man is WACKY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon....your delivery man delivered my 35 pound dog food to my neighbors home. She just got home and had to get a dolly to get to my house. That is expensive dog food!!! Happy it was returned to me!! I don't even hardly know this nice neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: Booker

customer_reviews.title: Great deal- cheaper than chain stores!
customer_reviews.text: The dogs seem to love the flavor (we get the chicken variant). Great value getting it through amazon vice chain pet stores when using the subscribe option- and we never have to worry about having to run to get dog food anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but it's been good for my Dog
customer_reviews.text: We've been feeding our 5 year old Golden Retriever this for years. She loves it and she has been healthy with no issues eating this food.
customer_reviews.author: supermonkey

customer_reviews.title: Really big Kibble size.
customer_reviews.text: After using Hill's Science Diet Large Breed Puppy, I was surprized at how large each kibble piece is for the 1-to-5 year-old bag. We buy Hill's because our Vet tells us to get this or Purina Pro-Plan. I prefer this. I might try the Lamb after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper to order off of Amazon than pick it up in the store! Our Vet recommends this Brand of dog food, and our dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Glad I can get it delivered instead of shopping & hauling it myself. I have a multi-dog household & do Rescue work as well so I go through a lot of this product each month. Subscribe & Save is a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: BeBe D.

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Personally I think that this brand of dog food is expensive but I think it’s good quality and my dog loves it. And it doesn’t seem to affect her stomach at all. What else is there?
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: science diet mobility dog food
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good dog food. It is expensive but it really helps those dogs who have mobility issues. Like mind does.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Novak

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: I'm asked to score 'ingredient quality' and 'flavor'. Well, I neither tasted nor performed a chemical or spectral analysis of the product's composition. But my dog eats it. All of it. Empty bowl every time.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L Hey

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dog
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dog food we will use now due to our poochs success. We tried a number of others that he couldn't digest and this one has had 100% good results.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Harris

customer_reviews.title: He is so much more intelligent now
customer_reviews.text: ..and he loves Science. Honestly we have been very happy with hills science diet. It has been recommended by multiple vets and we stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: Allen Michael

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Doodles love this. Easily digested and they scarf it down. Price is always comparable to everywhere else. Love it delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lomond

customer_reviews.title: Works for Us
customer_reviews.text: We switched from Blue Buffalo to Science Diet. Mercedes, our Dobbie,seems to like it a lot better. She's not turning up her nose at it like she did with Blue Buffalo.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: dog says yum
customer_reviews.text: If it is food, Bailey is in there. He loves this stuff, it is a little bigger pieces so you hear the crunch in the next room as he woofs it down.
customer_reviews.author: Growing A Smile

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves Science Diet
customer_reviews.text: My dog truly loves the flavor of Science Diet. It is a bit pricey, but you get what you pay for. If you care about your pet, you won't mind the investment. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Something changed.
customer_reviews.text: Was a great food dog got sick on the last bag. Not sure what changed. I changed dog food brands dog is fine now.
customer_reviews.author: P. Beagle

customer_reviews.title: Our Dog Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Per our Vet's recommendation, we switched our Siberain Husky's dog food to Science Diet. He loves it! We are trying the subscription method of purchasing, which will end up being awesome for us to have delivered to our home on a regular basis. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Dog Seems to Like It
customer_reviews.text: I've used Science Diet since my dog was a little pup, she seems to like it, and was impressed with the ingredients. A bit pricy, but is a vet recommended brand so would expect as much.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyZ

customer_reviews.title: Subscribe and save mess!
customer_reviews.text: Not a wise choice for subscribe and save. Each month it came packaged with other items and each month the other items mostly tea bags and cat treats would be free floating in the box as the dog food had destroyed their packaging and I would have fun cleaning it up.
customer_reviews.author: chocolate lover

customer_reviews.title: easy dog food delivery
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommends this food and seems to be one of the least expensive of the higher quality dog foods. Love the convenience of getting it thru Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mi_shell_not_ur_belle

customer_reviews.title: Not for my Bernese!
customer_reviews.text: My Bernese did not like it at all, went back to normal Science Diet! Dumped the food in the forest and some creature(s) ate it all!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: 100 pound Labradane loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great food for my sons Labradane! No issues in transitioning from another major brand!
customer_reviews.author: Savy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs seems to love this food since we switched. Two large breed dogs of different breed. They both love it and seem to be very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: bullsperger

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: Not only it is highly recommended by vets and bloggers, the bag itself is very well well built and has a great way to seal it if you don’t have a container that can fit it all. And our pups love it
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Barone

customer_reviews.title: My dogo got sick
customer_reviews.text: My dog used to love this food, recently (like some reviewers here) he got sick. Not sure if a change on recipe or what but not going to feed him with this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kapicu82

customer_reviews.title: Decent food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seems to like it. Glad it comes it a 35 lb. bag, my dogs go through this bag in about 1 1/2 weeks. I used to purchase blue buffalo, but this seems to be higher quality, especially coming from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cody S.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog food ever- it has glucosamine & chondroiton for mobility for dogs. My dog was limping when I fed him cheap food for a month. Then I went back to this and no more limping! Incredible the old adage you are what you eat it’s even true with dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Joulie Medosch

customer_reviews.title: Lost confidence in Hills after several recalls
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Hills food exclusively. After two successive recalls of their beef wet dog food, I lost confidence. Moving to Merricks and Taste of the Wild.
customer_reviews.author: WinMor

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: Love this food. Have used it for both dogs after trying more expensive dog foods. Never had a problem with this and recommended by our vets.
customer_reviews.author: Elperson

customer_reviews.title: Healthy but not terribly tasty
customer_reviews.text: Doggo really likes the taste of cheap crap dog food better. But I've read all the nutrition labels and she's stuck with healthier food. Plus, she eats less and makes less poop on the healthy food and stays a perfect weight. I wish there was some flavor besides chicken and barley though.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. My vet recommended it for her after she was done with puppy food.
customer_reviews.author: james adam

customer_reviews.title: My Big boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our Great Danes love this food. And their coats are shiny. I have noticed that even their odor is much less which I have read means they are getting good nutrients in their diet. Happy tails all around!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Dog lost his appetite after eating this product
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been very lethargic since eating this brand of dog food. He used to love science hill but the recent recipe change has made him very lethargic, unwilling to eat, and has caused him to eat grass during his walks. I would not recommend this brand to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey E. Peltz

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very fresh, came nicely packaged, absolutely love the resealable bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Not very tasty, but suitable for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This food is disgusting. The texture is grainy, and it falls apart in your mouth in a very unappetizing way. The first ingredient listed is chicken, but I couldn't make out even the slightest hint of chicken flavor. No amount of gravy or hot sauce makes it palatable. I just decided to feed it to the dogs. They seem to like it ok, but they aren't really discerning when it comes to cuisine. If dog foods are like people foods in that the more healthy they are, the worse they taste, then Hill's Science Diet Adult Large Breed Dry Dog Food is the Brussels sprout of dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G.

customer_reviews.title: I think this food has helped to keep our 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this food has helped to keep our 9 year old boxer young. She still has such a playful spirit. We got her when she was five and thanks to my sister in laws recommendation (she's a vet tech) switched her to Science Diet. Her stomach problems cleared up (gas) and she has lots of energy.
customer_reviews.author: Famous Amos

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: I have an Australian Shepard/Lab mix pup who is prone to runny poops but he has no issues with this dog food! I've been using subscribe & save for months because it is very good quality! Worth the extra money over grocery store food. Much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: The price is so much cheaper than other places and my sog loves it. Her coat is beautifull and so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It smells surprisingly delicious
customer_reviews.text: I approve of this dog food it smells good and taste good, hubby tried one and he said I would snack on these if it wasn’t dog food lol. Got it for my Great Dane
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good stuff! My husky tends to hide the food ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good stuff! My husky tends to hide the food bowl under anything until she's hungry. Dunno if that means that she likes it or is just saving it, but it's kinda cute haha.
customer_reviews.author: Mykii

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it. I’m sad they changed the shape; my lab sometimes chokes on them because they’re a little small for large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery to my home!
customer_reviews.text: Great to have this delivered. Why do they want me to rate the flavor? I don't eat this stuff and my dog can't talk!
customer_reviews.author: mikeApollo11

customer_reviews.title: Only dog food we'll buy
customer_reviews.text: Only food we give our 2 and a half year chocolate lab. His coat and his teeth are pretty amazing. Changed our older (12 year old yellow lab) over to it too; although a smaller amount (he's not as active as the puppy and was getting a tad heavy).
customer_reviews.author: CJ In Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it, seems healthy enough, like the Velcro feature, only wish it would be more sustainable
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Megan Wallace

customer_reviews.title: I have this on my monthly subscribe and save list ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my monthly subscribe and save list, two bags every month. Its all I've been feeding my dogs for a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Smith

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to anyone who really cares for their pet. Cash ( my dog) is my best friend
customer_reviews.text: I like this dog food because he is losing weight and it has real beef in it
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Ray

customer_reviews.title: Most convenient way to get your dog's food
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes on the first, without fail. I don't have to remember to get it, or to lug it home (We have a big dog.) And it's super easy to modify your shipments when needed (like when your dog goes off feed in the summer and he eats less).
customer_reviews.author: wradinger

customer_reviews.title: a single kibble also worked nicely as an occasional treat for that little guy
customer_reviews.text: This is a higher quality food than most grocery/box stores in my area will carry. This price is hard to beat, too, when you consider that it is delivered to my door. The individual kibbles are definitely sized for a large dog, and seem to make eating easier for him. When my roommate had a chihuahua, a single kibble also worked nicely as an occasional treat for that little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Thank you 😊 for offering this ❤️ product.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you 😊 for offering this ❤️ product. Our 🐕 Dogs Love 💙 it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Nuckols

customer_reviews.title: Good Dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to love this food, she guards her when the other dog walks by. I've fed my dogs Science Diet for years.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, however AMAZON DELIVERY seems to have a hard time delivering to my FRONT DOOR.
customer_reviews.author: AvidAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: She loves it, her coat looks great, and her teeth seem healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Deb S

customer_reviews.title: Food may be tainted.
customer_reviews.text: Recipe changed. Do not buy. My dog had been eating this food for over a year with no problems. Suddenly, Hills changed the recipe on my last order. Unfortunately, after only 4 days of eating this new batch of food my dog got sick and died. I’ve called Hills but they have not added this food to their recall list yet. Be careful. My dog died of symptoms relating to kidney failure due to vitamin D overdose.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gibson

customer_reviews.title: ... results are not always consistent but he seems to love this food so for anyone who's dog is not ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog's allergies seem to be a mystery since I have had him tested and the results are not always consistent but he seems to love this food so for anyone who's dog is not sensitive to chicken I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit pricey but this is the food my vet recommends for my dog. He seems to enjoy it too.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find dog food that doesn’t have artificial ingredients and chicken by-products that is a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my dog at a healthy weight and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Flintoft

customer_reviews.title: Dog keeps eating it.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes delicious! I've replace my entire cereal collection with dog food. My children still have no idea! I didn't know what to do with all the cereal I needed to get rid of, so I fed it to the dog.
customer_reviews.author: JGreen

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as store bought
customer_reviews.text: My dog developed a severe allergic skin reaction from this food. The store bought ingredients are different. I tried to return the item but never received an email or any correspondence at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B. Healey

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it and actually eat less of it in a month the my previous brand blue buffalo. My cat keeps trying to eat it as well so I've switched them to it and the same thing has happened. My animals love it and it is worth the slightly higher price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY

customer_reviews.title: No table scraps.
customer_reviews.text: We have fed this to our Husky dogs for a long time. It must fill them up good cause they don't eat alot. And their breath smells better than some people.
customer_reviews.author: Sharion Carter

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves it
customer_reviews.text: My pup has a sensitive stomach and this is the only food she can eat. So much more convenient getting my pups food delivered to my front door for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: STOP!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't get them to stop additional bags of dog food!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rudydog

product_meta.title: Hill's Science Diet Dry Dog Food, Adult, Large Breed, Chicken & Barley Recipe
product_meta.description: Size:35 LBBig dogs have their own set of nutrition needs, so Hill's Science Diet Large Breed adult dog food is specially formulated to fuel the energy needs of large breed dogs during the prime of their life. Made with high-quality, easy-to digest-ingredients, this food made for fully grown large dogs supports the building of lean muscle with high-quality protein, as well as glucosamine and chondroitin for healthy joints & mobility. A balanced blend of omega-6s and vitamin E nourishes your dog's skin for a healthy, shiny coat. There’s more to love with the new look of Science Diet. Some of our products also have new names, new kibble shapes & new formulas.
feature_bullets: A dry dog food specially formulated to fuel the energy needs of large breed adult dogs
Supports your grown dog's joint health with natural sources of glucosamine & chondroitin
Maintain your senior dog's healthy skin and shiny coat with nourishing omega-6 fatty acids & vitamin E
Promotes lean muscle in large dogs with high-quality protein
Made in the USA with global ingredients you can trust
